column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " Are you all right ?
#Text=We 're totally safe , unless we get caught in another fight between Su and Lin .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Lin willingly took you to her sister ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Not exactly .
#Text=We got a call about an airbender and it turned out to be Su 's daughter Opal .
#Text=She 'll be headed your way soon .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Really ?
#Text=That 's wonderful !
#Text=" Bolin says : " She is wonderful , and pretty , and so smart , and she smells like flowers ... Sorry .
#Text=Bolin , out .
#Text=" Korra says : " How 's the training going ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Not so well , I 'm afraid .
#Text=No one seems to be interested in the hard work of becoming part of the Air Nation .
#Text=" Korra says : " You need to give yourself a break .
#Text=Let Jinora and the kids help you out , and what about Bumi ?
#Text=He was a naval commander , maybe he has some ideas about how you get people motivated .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Bumi ?!
#Text=He 's my worst student .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , but he loves to organize people .
#Text=If you ask him for help , you can trick him into taking more responsibility by making him think the whole thing with his idea .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " That actually sounds like a good plan .
#Text=You 're turning into a pretty wise Avatar after all .
#Text=" Korra says : " Conflict resolution , that 's what I do .
#Text="
